channel.title: MarcoPolo Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.2
item.description:
This is MarcoPolo version 1.2.

  • Significantly improved Action creation UI
  • Bluetooth bug workaround added that prevented laptops from going to sleep (Trac ticket:45)
  • Memory leak fixed in Power evidence source
  • IP evidence source made asynchronous (faster and more responsive)
  • German translation added, courtesy of Christoph Schmitz
  • Support hiding from status bar (Trac ticket:40)
  • Advanced preferences tab added
  • Updated USB vendor and OUI databases

item.title: Version 1.1.5
item.description:
This is MarcoPolo version 1.1.5. It is primarily a bug-fix release with no significantly new features except for switch smoothing (see below).

  • Bluetooth crashing fixes for PPC; for safety, Bluetooth is now disabled by default
  • Reworked, more responsive Bluetooth evidence source
  • Switch smoothing (Trac ticket:4) to prevent unreliable devices or evidence sources from triggering incorrect location switching

item.title: Version 1.1
item.description:
This is MarcoPolo version 1.1.

  • New evidence sources for rules: FireWire and Power
  • New actions: ShellScript, ToggleBluetooth and ToggleWiFi
  • Paired Bluetooth devices are supported
  • WiFi evidence source doesn't scan when associated, unless explicitly configured
  • Location names with Unicode characters are supported
  • Wake-from-sleep triggers an immediate update
  • Updated USB vendor and OUI databases
  • UI improvements, including better rule/action options and better icons
  • Credits section added to About dialog

item.title: Version 1.0
item.description:
This is MarcoPolo version 1.0. We are now officially out of beta, and ready for World Domination!

  • Many UI tweaks and polish
  • Complete (though not exhaustive) manual
  • Currently-associated WiFi AP included in WiFi SSID list
  • Bluetooth fixes
  • Open action crashing bug fix

item.title: Version 0.9.1
item.description:
• Fixed a bad memory leak in USB evidence source
  • Disable Bluetooth evidence source by default
  • Updated USB vendor and OUI databases

item.title: Version 0.9
item.description:
• Actions now have Arrival/Departure modes
  • New-and-improved rule-adding UI
  • New 'MailSMTPServer' action
  • Preferences window now comes to front properly
  • Some Bluetooth scanning bugs fixed
